title: Tonari no Juunin
description:
A collection of stories:

3. Shizu Bato (Scissor Battle / Scissors Heart)
Takahashi Yoh, who is bad with getting his hair cut, visits a salon and is charmed by the charismatic and gentle stylist Kuno Masaya. Will love blossom?

4. Meeting Tracks

5. Brilliant Tone
